name: Microsoft Todo Dark
description: Dark Theme for Microsoft To-Do Web
additional_info:
Change Log:

January 19 2020:
    1. Dark Mode on Sign In Page.
    2. Custom Scrollbar in Sign In Page.

December 1 2019:
    1. Add Dark Background to Loading Screen.
    2. Remove White Shadow from Side Panels.

November 18 2019:
    1. Remove Inversion from Drag Task Place Indicator.
    2. Tone down input color.

November 16 2019:
    1. Remove Inversion in Settings, Announcement & Help Section.
    2. Remove Inversion in List Item Text, Set it to White.
    3. Fix Input Color.
    4. Remove Inversion in Add Note Focus Border.

November 15 2019:
    1. Remove Emoji Inversion in Side Navbar.
    2. Remove Inversion in Task List Header Edit Input.

November 14 2019:
    1. Remove User Avatar Inversion in My Account Section.
    2. Links in App Launcher are Not Inverted Anymore,

discussions.name: works great, but doesn't show up in to-do.live.com searches (where the webapp now resides)
